ValidationRule.description: Force users to populate the Main Cause Text (if Other) field, when the Main Cause value of "Other - Complete Mandatory Text Field" is chosen
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Reference PAC Record Type" ), ( ISPICKVAL(Main_Cause__c, 'Other - Complete Mandatory Text Field') ), ( ISBLANK(Main_Cause_Text_if_Other__c) ), ($Profile.Name <>"System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must enter a value in the Main Cause Text (if Other) field, when selecting a Main Cause value of "Other - Complete Mandatory Text Field".
